summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.3 mm) and cloud levels (up 617 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1568 m), and light levels (up 3954 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 617.3m lower than yesterday, 534.4m lower than the past week, 1568.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1106.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and a mix of sun and clouds. Changeable conditions.
